about.meetTheTeamText: Directors Marcela Boturao & Bart van Linden would like to welcome you to meet the team of Exclusive Algarve Villas. Both Marcela and Bart have been active in selling luxury real estate in the Algarve for over a decade. They have built up a multi award winning company and continue to grow the business year after year.
about.proudAchievementDescription: Exclusive Algarve Villas has won various awards over the years, from “Best Real Estate Agency Website” to “Best Real Estate Agency Portugal” by the International Property Awards in London. Furthermore has also won an award in 2019 by Best Luxury Real Estate Agency 2019 by Build Magazine.
about.textAboutEav: Exclusive Algarve Villas has been a known name in the sale of luxurious and unique Properties in the Western and Central Algarve since 2006. With many years of experience, we lead a team of property professionals who are knowledgeable in their work area and will be dedicated to show you all the ins and outs of the Algarve region.
about.title: ABOUT EXCLUSIVE ALGARVE VILLAS

theTeamPage.directorsParagraph: Directors Marcela Boturao & Bart van Linden would like to welcome you to meet the team of Exclusive Algarve Villas. Both Marcela and Bart have been active in selling luxury real estate in the Algarve for over a decade. They have built up a multi award winning company and continue to grow the business year after year.

annotationsPage.startExploringProperties: Start exploring properties and add your personal notes and annotations. Keep track of important details, observations, and thoughts about properties you're interested in.
annotationsPage.addDetailedAnnotationsTip: Add detailed annotations to properties to remember key features, potential concerns, or personal preferences. This helps you make better decisions when comparing multiple properties.
annotationsPage.pageNotFoundDescriptionPart1: The page you're looking for doesn't exist. There

becomeAVendorPage.sellMyPropertyInTheAlgarve: SELL MY PROPERTY IN THE ALGARVE
becomeAVendorPage.youDecidedToSellYourPropertyInTheAlgarve: You decided to sell your property in the Algarve, and now what?
becomeAVendorPage.vendorsOftenFeelOverwhelmedWithBureaucra: Vendors often feel overwhelmed with bureaucracy, unsure of where to start from, when they decide on selling a property in the Algarve. At Exclusive Algarve Villas we are here to assist you all the way with the sale of your property and ensure that you optimize all aspects of selling your real estate asset towards a successful sale.
becomeAVendorPage.observeYourPropertyPriorToMarket: Observe your property prior to put it on the market for sale, and now answer, how appealing is your property to buyers?
becomeAVendorPage.youGuessItRight: You guess it right, there's homework to do!
becomeAVendorPage.importantPropertyDocumentsInOrder: It's important that all your property documents are in order before listing your property in real estate agency.
becomeAVendorPage.propertyLookingBestAndSignedContract: Now that your property is looking at its best and you signed the mediation contract, you are ready to sell!
becomeAVendorPage.propertyDisplayedWideNetwork: Your property will be displayed on our wide network of international property portals and websites.
becomeAVendorPage.stagingYourPropertyIsEssential: Staging your property for sale is essential to attract buyers in today´s real estate market. Make sure that you keep your villa or apartment clean of clutter and personal items, use neutral colors throughout, open windows and turn on lights during viewings.
becomeAVendorPage.presentYourPropertyWellMaintained: It is equally essential to present your property for sale to buyers well maintained. When you’ve been living in the property for many years, small maintenance jobs can be overlooked. Is your home in need of tender love and care?
becomeAVendorPage.takeCareOfRepairsBeforeMarket: Take care of any repairs needed before putting the property on the market for sale, to achieve the best selling price on your villa or apartment for sale. If you think that your property needs a new kitchen or bathroom, leave it to the next owner, as the buyers often welcome the idea of small refurbishments.
becomeAVendorPage.isMyPropertyDocumentationInOrder: IS MY PROPERTY DOCUMENTATION IN ORDER
becomeAVendorPage.importantDocumentsBeforeListing: It's important that all your property documents are in order before listing your property with our real estate agency. We can meet with you and go through this together.
becomeAVendorPage.licensedRealEstateAgency: Exclusive Algarve Villas is a licensed real estate agency with the license number AMI-7516 by Exclusive Living Mediaçao Imobilaria Lda.
becomeAVendorPage.signedContractRequiredForListing: As a licensed real estate agency, we are required to have a signed mediation contract (Agency agreement) in order to officially list your property for sale. So, NO CONTRACT = NO SALE!!
becomeAVendorPage.mediationContractsValidSixMonths: Mediation contracts are normally valid for a 6 months with renewable equal periods, and can be on an “exclusive” or a “non-exclusive” basis. We use the standard contract approved by IMPIC, the organ regulating the real estate and building licenses. Any questions on the contract can be clarified by our sales team.
becomeAVendorPage.propertyLookingBestDocumentsInOrder: Now that your property is looking at its best, all the documents of the property are in order and you signed the mediation contract, you are ready to sell your property!
becomeAVendorPage.professionalTeamMarketsProperty: Our professional team at Exclusive Algarve Villas market your property for sale with the assistance of our in-house photographer and works with you on the property description, ensuring that all property’s features and equipment are well documented and presented.
becomeAVendorPage.highEndLuxuryRealEstateServices: For high-end luxury real estate, sea front villas and unique exclusive homes for sale in the West and Central Algarve, we also use the services of professional photographers and drone video services.
becomeAVendorPage.happyToAssistYou: and we'll be happy to assist you.
becomeAVendorPage.useWebformBelow: Alternatively, you can use the webform below to submit information on the property you have for sale and one member of our sales team will be in touch with you shortly.
becomeAVendorPage.thankYouForTrust: Thank you for your trust, we look forward to working with you soon!
becomeAVendorPage.passportOrOtherIdOfSeller: Passport or other ID of the seller(s)
becomeAVendorPage.copyOfFiscalIdNumber: Copy of the Fiscal ID Number (NIF)
becomeAVendorPage.companySellingPropertyShareCertificates: If a company is selling the property, the share certificates and holders of these need to be identified
becomeAVendorPage.floorPlansFinalVersion: Floor plans (Final approved version with the stamp from the camara)
becomeAVendorPage.quickChecklistTitle: Here's a quick checklist of documents required for real estate owned in Portugal:
becomeAVendorPage.checklistPurposeDescription: This checklist outlines the essential documents required to legally sell real estate in Portugal. Its main goal is to ensure the property is fully compliant with local regulations and that the seller's identity and ownership are properly verified. The documents include personal or corporate identification, proof of property registration and technical specifications, as well as legal permits like the habitation license and energy certificate—ensuring a smooth and transparent transaction for both seller and buyer.

blogDetailsNotFoundPage.blogNotFoundDescription: The blog post you are looking for doesn't exist or may have been moved. Please check the URL or browse our other content.

blogsPage.welcomeParagraph: Directors Marcela Boturao & Bart van Linden would like to welcome you to meet the team of Exclusive Algarve Villas. Both Marcela and Bart have been active in selling luxury real estate in the Algarve for over a decade. They have built up a multi award winning company and continue to grow the business year after year.

buyingProcessPage.buyingIntroductionParagraph1: Buying a new home in a foreign country with different rules, legislation, language, and culture differences can seem like a daunting task….right? It doesn’t have to be!
buyingProcessPage.buyingIntroductionParagraph2: Just as yourself, many others felt the same, but before you, we’ve assisted hundreds of happy buyers to a new property in the Algarve. This is why we offer you our many years of experience, knowledge and local network of professionals to make the buying process a pleasant experience!
buyingProcessPage.buyingIntroductionParagraph3: It is very important to work with professionals who are licensed. Whether it’s the real estate agency, builders, lawyers, architects etc. We highly recommend avoiding any ‘free lancers’ or other non-licensed services you will come across
buyingProcessPage.buyingIntroductionParagraph4: The property search will mostly start by scouting websites and property portals to get an initial feel of what your budget can buy in the Algarve, what is currently on the market, what are the options available in your preferred area(s), and finally to identify the properties that you find of interest.
buyingProcessPage.buyingIntroductionParagraph5: Choosing to work with a reliable and established agency such as Exclusive Algarve Villas, will give you the advantage of being able to profit from our knowledge of the market and our long standing experience. Having already weathered various ‘storms’ in the real estate market, we have stood solid and continue to be their “Portuguese link” to all our overseas clients.
buyingProcessPage.buyingIntroductionParagraph6: In addition, when you chose Exclusive Algarve Villas, you immediately get access to a lot more - At Exclusive Algarve Villas, we work with a trusted partner network of local agencies, giving you a huge range of property options, without having to do any additional work. Our free ‘property hunt service’ gives you the opportunity to access properties that have not yet reached the public market.
buyingProcessPage.searchDescription: Nowadays, the property search will start mostly online and often before clients have a booked trip to Portugal. This is an excellent way to begin the process of finding the right property. We can already begin to work for you at this stage – we will help you make a ‘shortlist’ of suitable homes to match your needs, in your preferred area, budget and other requirements. This eliminates unpleasant surprises and wasting time on visiting properties that will cause you frustration.
buyingProcessPage.findDescription: Once you have visited the selected properties, and if necessary, we can adjust the search criteria until you have found what you are looking for. Once you found “the one”, we then go to the next phase which is submitting an offer. Although there is no official offer document that you need to your offer is presented in writing, stating the exact terms and conditions before we present your offer to the vendors.
buyingProcessPage.buyDescription: (don´t celebrate just yet………..) Once your offer is accepted, we always recommend that you work with a lawyer to be able guide you through the process in your language and represent your interests as best as possible. Although there are International legal firms that can be hired, we would recommend a Portuguese licensed local lawyer. This will save time if documentation needs to be handled in the local council and other entities.
buyingProcessPage.buyFinalizeDescription: (yes, almost there.... ;) The most important step is in between having your offer agreed and the signing of the promissory contract, in Portuguese called the CPCV (Contrato de Promessa de Compra e Venda). The promissory contract is the official binding contract outlining the accepted terms of the sale - the price, conditions of payment, dates of completion, and any other conditions both parties might have agreed upon. With the signing of this contract, the initial payment on the property is then required. Generally it will take about 2 weeks for lawyers to get the contract signed and to secure the deal. Once signed, you have officially accepted to purchase the property and you will soon have your dream home.
buyingProcessPage.powerOfAttorneyDescription: Power of attorney - If you are not in Portugal, and might not be present for the signing of the deeds, it is recommended that you issue a POA (Power of Attorney). This will allow your legal representative to obtain your fiscal number, sign the promissory contract, and deeds on your behalf. (The POA will also be useful for after you acquire the property, in order to change all the utility bills into your name on your behalf.)
buyingProcessPage.lawyerAndCpcvDescription: Lawyer requests a fiscal number for the buyer(s). CPCV, preparation of the promissory contract. Generally, a minimum of 10% deposit is required on the CPCV, unless agreed otherwise. With off-plan properties or ones that are under construction, a plan of stage payments might be put in place.
buyingProcessPage.contractSigningDescription: Once both parties have agreed to the CPCV, the contract can be signed by buyer and vendor if they are both locals, or otherwise, by their lawyers via a power of attorney.
buyingProcessPage.buyAndOwnParagraph1: Before you buy and own your property, the taxman will require that the IMT purchase tax and stamp duty are paid. Without this tax payment the deeds can’t take place. The invoice for this tax payment is issued by the lawyer or the notary, and proof of payment is required at the deeds. Click here to see the purchase costs & taxes.
buyingProcessPage.buyAndOwnParagraph2: Deeds can be done as quickly as 2 weeks or as slow as weeks or months. There is no rule that determines the timeline of this process. The timing is determined by the needs of the buyer and seller, and the workload and speed of the legal representatives involved. Generally the deeds are scheduled between 2-6 weeks after the promissory contract has been signed. We always recommend to the buyer to inspect the property prior to the deeds to confirm that the property is being signed over in a clean and good condition to be moved into, as well as if there is inventory included in the sale, that it is confirmed and in acceptable condition.
buyingProcessPage.buyAndOwnParagraph3: Deeds are done at a public notary office. Either party can select the notary. There is no restriction on the council or area where it must be done. At this stage, the buyer must provide the payment for the remainder of the purchase price. Commonly done by a certified cheque, or bank cheque. (Must be ordered in advance). Once the deeds have been signed, the new owner of the property receives the keys and all respective accesses to the property.
buyingProcessPage.buyAndOwnParagraph4: **** due to the new regulations implemented for the prevention of Money Laundering, all notaries and Real estate Agencies must obtain personal documentation on the parties involved and all real estate transactions are then reported to the Real estate and Construction institute (IMPIC) The notary will then officially register the property to your name at the Land Registry office and tax department. Within a few weeks the new registration documents will be ready.
buyingProcessPage.tipsDescription: Always ask for a copy of the deed at the notary, or your lawyer.
buyingProcessPage.registrationDescription1: The tax office and land registry departments will be notified of the change of ownership of the property and issue new documents in your name(s). All Utility bills, such as water, electricity, gas, alarm, internet, etc will also have to be changed into your name. Meter readings are taken before the deeds and communicated to both buyer and sellers (lawyer) so that any adjustments on the monthly payments can be balanced out between the buyer and the vendor, based on the date of change of ownership of the property.
buyingProcessPage.registrationDescription2: Generally internet, phone, paid TV etc will not be possible to change contract and you will need to contract these services.
buyingProcessPage.registrationDescription3: Exclusive Algarve Villas recommends always using a local licensed lawyer when buying or selling real estate in Portugal. If you have any questions about the buying process and would like to be contacted by a member of our sales team, please leave your name and contact details below and we will get in touch with you.

contactPage.exclusiveAlgarveVillasDescription: Exclusive Algarve Villas has been a known name in the sale of luxurious and unique Properties in the Western and Central Algarve since 2006. With many years of experience, we lead a team of property professionals who are knowledgeable in their work area and will be dedicated to show you all the ins and outs of the Algarve region.
contactPage.vilamouraAddress: Avenida Tivoli, Conjunto VarandaMar, B, Bloco 3, R/C E. 8125-410 Vilamoura
contactPage.lagoaAddress: Rua Ernesto Cabrita Edificio Vales, Loja - A 8400 387 Lagoa - Algarve - Portugal
contactPage.lagosAddress: R. Dr. José Francisco Tello Queiroz Lote 3, Loja R, 8600-707 Lagos
contactPage.localCallMobile: Local call to national mobile phone

digitalNomadVisaPage.visaDescriptionPart1: The term “Digital Nomad” defines an individual with a job that is 100% remote and, due to the greater flexibility of this format, can move frequently from country to country and live in different places while working.
digitalNomadVisaPage.visaDescriptionPart2: In October 2022 Portugal introduced a new digital nomad visa Program offering Citizens, outside the EU/EEA/Swiss, both Temporary Stay Visas for Digital Nomads and the Residence Visa and Residence Permit for Digital Nomads.
digitalNomadVisaPage.visaDescriptionPart3: The Temporary Stay Visa allows for stays in Portugal for up to 1 year , with the possibility of renewal.
digitalNomadVisaPage.visaDescriptionPart4: The Digital Nomad Residence Visa allows for a longer stay in Portugal and is a good option for those seeking to get residence or start the path toward Portuguese citizenship.
digitalNomadVisaPage.applicantIncomeRequirement: Have an income that is 4x the Portuguese minimum wage, so €2,800 per month.
digitalNomadVisaPage.applicantEmploymentStatus: Be self-employed or employed by a company outside of Portugal
digitalNomadVisaPage.applicantResidencyPath: Once a resident in Portugal, Digital Nomads can apply for the Non-Habitual Resident Tax Regime and, after 5 years of living in the country, they can apply for Portuguese Citizenship.
digitalNomadVisaPage.lawyerRecommendation: Exclusive Algarve Villas recommends always using a local licensed lawyer when buying or selling real estate in Portugal.

favoritesPage.clickHeartIcon: Click the heart icon on any property to add it to your favorites list.
favoritesPage.savePropertiesCompareShare: You can save properties to compare them later, share with friends, or keep track of your preferred choices during your property search.
favoritesPage.pageNotExistStart: The page you're looking for doesn't exist.

goldenVisaProgramPage.noteGoldenVisaCeized: Please note that the Golden Visa program as formerly known has ceized to exist, it is however possible to still obtain a golden visa, however this is not anymore linked to purchasing real estate. (information updated on october 2023). Please check the latest information with your local lawyer.
goldenVisaProgramPage.rulesResidencePermitDescription: The rules governing the granting of Residence Permit for Investment (ARI / Golden Visa), in force from 8 October 2012, enable third country nationals to obtain a temporary residence permit to conduct business activities with visa waiver to enter national territory. The beneficiaries of ARI / Golden Visa are entitled to  :
goldenVisaProgramPage.residenceVisaWaiver: Residence visa waiver for entering Portugal;
goldenVisaProgramPage.livingWorkingPortugal: Living and working in Portugal, on condition that they stay in Portugal for a period of 7 or more days, in the first year, and 14 or more days, in the subsequent years;
goldenVisaProgramPage.schengenVisaExemption: Visa exemption for travelling within the Schengen Area;
goldenVisaProgramPage.applyingPermanentResidence: Applying for permanent residence (pursuant to the Aliens Act – Act number 23/2007 of 4 July with the current wording). To the citizens holding a residence permit for investment purposes and their family members, complying with the requirements provided in article 80 of the Aliens Act and wish to be granted with a permanent residence permit, a permanent residence permit for investment purposes shall be issued, exempt of the provided in article 85, n.ºs 2, 3 and 4, subparagraph b) of the same diploma (cancellation of the right due to absences from the national territory, see article 65-k of the Regulatory Decree 84/07 of 5/11, as amended). The Permanent Residence Permit for investment purposes may be subject to specific fees of analysis and issuance, to be regulated by amendments to Ordinance 1334-E/2010, of December 31;
goldenVisaProgramPage.applyingPortugueseCitizenship: Applying for Portuguese citizenship, by naturalization, provided all other requirements set out by the Nationality Act are fulfilled (Act number 37/81 of 3 October, with the current wording);
goldenVisaProgramPage.eligibilityDescription: All third country citizens who conduct an investment activity, as an individual businessperson or through a company set up in Portugal or in another EU Member State and who, in addition, are stably settled in Portugal, provided these citizens fulfil the quantitative requirements and the time requirements set out by the relevant legislation, may apply for a Residence Permit for Investment, by one of the following routes:
goldenVisaProgramPage.capitalTransfer1_5Million: Capital transfer with a value equal to or above 1.5 million Euros;
goldenVisaProgramPage.create10JobPositions: The creation of, at least, 10 job positions;
goldenVisaProgramPage.capitalTransfer500kResearch: Capital transfer with a value equal to or above 500 thousand Euros for investing in research activities conducted by public or private scientific research institutions involved in the national scientific or technologic system;
goldenVisaProgramPage.capitalTransfer250kArtsHeritage: Capital transfer with a value equal to or above 250 thousand Euros for investing in artistic output or supporting the arts, for reconstruction or refurbishment of the national heritage, through the local and central authorities, public institutions, public corporate sector, public foundations, private foundations of public interest, networked local authorities, local corporate sector organizations, local associations and public cultural associations, pursuing activities of artistic output, and reconstruction or maintenance of the national heritage;
goldenVisaProgramPage.capitalTransfer500kInvestmentFunds: Capital transfer of the amount of 500 thousand Euros, or higher, for the acquisition of units of investment funds or venture capital fund of funds dedicated to the capitalisation of companies, capital injected under the Portuguese legislation, whose maturity, at the moment of the investment, is, at least, of five years and, at least, 60% of the investments is realized in commercial companies with head office in national territory;
goldenVisaProgramPage.capitalTransfer500kCommercialSociety: Capital transfer of the amount of 500 thousand Euros, or higher, for constitution of a commercial society with head office in the national territory, combined with the creation of five permanent working jobs, or for the reinforcement of the share capital of a commercial society with head office in national territory, already existing, with the creation or keeping of working jobs, with a minimum of five permanent jobs, and for a minimum period of three years.

termsAndConditionsPage.privacyNoticeIntro1: This privacy notice discloses the privacy policies of Exclusivealgarvevillas.com. This privacy notice applies solely to information collected by this website. It aims to inform you about:
termsAndConditionsPage.privacyNoticeIntro2: What personally identifiable information is collected through the website, how it is used and with whom it may be shared.
termsAndConditionsPage.choicesRegardingYourData: The choices available to you regarding the use of your data.
termsAndConditionsPage.securityProcedures: The security procedures in place to protect the misuse of your information.
termsAndConditionsPage.correctInaccuracies: How to correct any inaccuracies in the information provided.
termsAndConditionsPage.collectionAndUseOfPersonalInformation: COLLECTION AND USE OF PERSONAL INFORMATION
termsAndConditionsPage.soleOwnersOfInformation: We are the sole owners of the information collected on this site. We only have access to collect information that is voluntarily provided to us via email, form, chat or other direct contact.
termsAndConditionsPage.noSellingOfInformation: We will not sell or disclose this information to third parties. We may use automated platforms to send newsletters, ensuring compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation. This platform allows data to be deleted, accessed and edited in a simple and transparent way, following the "double opt-in" policy.
termsAndConditionsPage.useInformationToRespond: We will use your information to respond to the reason you contacted us. We will not share your information with third parties outside our organization, except when necessary to respond to your request.
termsAndConditionsPage.contactByEmail: Unless you indicate otherwise, we may contact you by email in the future to tell you about special offers, new products or services or changes to this privacy policy.
termsAndConditionsPage.useAndDisclosureConditions: We may use and disclose your personal information only as follows:
termsAndConditionsPage.promoteServicesAndProducts: To promote our services and products. You can stop receiving promotional emails from us by following the unsubscribe instructions included in the footer of each email we send.
termsAndConditionsPage.sendInformationalContent: To send you informational and promotional content that you choose to receive. If you wish to stop receiving emails, you can unsubscribe by following the instructions included in the footer of each email we send.
termsAndConditionsPage.ensureCompliance: Ensure compliance with our Terms of Service and applicable law.
termsAndConditionsPage.complyWithLegalRequirements: Comply with legal requirements, such as compliance with court orders, requests for information, valid summons or other appropriate legal mechanisms.
termsAndConditionsPage.provideInformationToAdvisors: Provide information to our representatives and advisors, such as lawyers and accountants, to help us comply with legal and security requirements.
termsAndConditionsPage.processAndDefendLawsuit: To process and defend a lawsuit, arbitration or court proceeding.
termsAndConditionsPage.transferInformationOnSale: Transfer your information in the event of a sale, merger, consolidation, liquidation, reorganization or acquisition. In this case, we will notify you of the change by posting a notice on this website, and anyone who has signed up will be subject to our obligations under this Privacy Policy.
termsAndConditionsPage.checkDataHeld: In order to check what data we hold on you, if any, please send an e-mail to info@exclusivealgarvevillas.com.
termsAndConditionsPage.securityCommitment: Ensuring the confidentiality, integrity and availability of customer data is a commitment we make to all our customers and users.
termsAndConditionsPage.bestSecurityPractices: Our company follows the best information security management practices, requiring our employees to comply with strict security standards. We ensure the security of the personal data communicated to us and cannot use it for purposes other than those defined in the contract, nor can we correlate it with other data at our disposal.
termsAndConditionsPage.internetDataRisk: Please be aware that data circulating on the Internet is not fully protected against possible misuse, and you are solely responsible for communicating passwords, confidential codes and any other sensitive information.
termsAndConditionsPage.accessCorrectionOppositionDeletionOfPers: ACCESS, CORRECTION, OPPOSITION AND DELETION OF PERSONAL DATA
termsAndConditionsPage.rightsOfDataSubject: In accordance with the applicable legislation, as the data subject, you have the right, at any time, to access your personal data, request its rectification or addition, oppose the processing of data (except those strictly necessary for the provision of the service), request data portability, request the deletion of your data for marketing or telemarketing purposes, or inclusion in subscriber lists and information services.
termsAndConditionsPage.requestActionsByEmail: You can request any of the above actions by sending an e-mail to info@exclusivealgarvevillas.com.
termsAndConditionsPage.effectOfDeletionRequests: If you request the deletion of some or all of your personal data, some of the services requested may not be provided, as we need to keep the personal data necessary to comply with our legal obligations.
termsAndConditionsPage.cookiesStored: While you use this Service, we may store "cookies" on your computer.
termsAndConditionsPage.cookiesUsage: We use cookies for authentication, user session authentication, preferences and site movement, anonymous and aggregate marketing analytics, performance analysis, retargeting and aggregate trend tracking.
termsAndConditionsPage.cookiesTurningOff: You can turn cookies off by following your browser's instructions, but if you block cookies, it may be more difficult (or perhaps impossible) to use some features of our website.
termsAndConditionsPage.postingChanges: If we make any changes to the privacy policy, we will post those changes on this website. We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time.
termsAndConditionsPage.effectivenessOfChanges: All changes will take effect immediately after they are published on the website. If we make material changes to this statement, we will notify you here that it has been updated, so that you are aware of what information we collect, how we use it and under what circumstances.
termsAndConditionsPage.objectToChangesAdvice: If you object to changes in our privacy policy, you should stop using our services, including the website.
termsAndConditionsPage.questionsContactInstructions: If you have any questions or comments, or if you wish to update, delete or change any personal information we hold relating to you, or if you have any concerns about the way we deal with privacy issues, please contact us at info@exclusivealgarvevillas.com.

yearlyPropertyTaxesPage.whenOwningRealEstateInPortugal: When owning real estate in Portugal
yearlyPropertyTaxesPage.yearlyPropertyTaxesDescriptionPart1: Yearly property taxes when owning real estate in Portugal.
yearlyPropertyTaxesPage.yearlyPropertyTaxesDescriptionPart2: The yearly council tax is called IMI, and for real estate with a tax value of over €600.000, there is an additional tax called the AIMI. More information about these yearly taxes below :
yearlyPropertyTaxesPage.imiDescription1: In Portugal every property pays IMI tax, which is the yearly council tax owed on the property. This is calculated on the fiscal value of the property. Every council has the liberty to change within a certain level the yearly IMI rates.
yearlyPropertyTaxesPage.imiDescription2: In 2024 the councils can charge between 0,30 and 0.5% of the fiscal value of your property. This fiscal value is generally lower than your purchase price. For rustic land, this rate can go up to 0,8% .
yearlyPropertyTaxesPage.imiDescription3: To stimulate the redevelopment or sale of ruins and derelict properties in various town centres, some councils will apply higher council taxes. This can go up to 6 x times the normal IMI rate.
yearlyPropertyTaxesPage.imiDescription4Part1: The property tax for properties up to euro 100.000 is payable in May
yearlyPropertyTaxesPage.imiDescription4Part2: Properties with values between euro 100.000 and 500.000 are payable in two tranches - 50% in May and 50% in November.
yearlyPropertyTaxesPage.imiDescription5: For properties with a fiscal value above euro 500.000, the payments are made in 3 tranches - May, August and November.
yearlyPropertyTaxesPage.aimiDescriptionPart1: Since 2017 a new, additional IMI has been introduced called the AIMI (additional IMI tax)
yearlyPropertyTaxesPage.aimiDescriptionPart2: The AIMI tax is applicable to private persons but also companies. Exemptions include: commercial real estate, business, industry and services.
yearlyPropertyTaxesPage.aimiTaxTableDescription: The AIMI tax is calculated on top of the IMI tax and calculated on the rateable value of your property.

clientTestimonial.exclusiveAwardsDescription: Exclusive Algarve Villas has won various awards over the years, from "Best Real Estate Agency Website" to "Best Real Estate Agency Portugal" by the International Property Awards in London. Furthermore has also won an award in 2019 by Best Luxury Real Estate Agency 2019 by Build Magazine.

meetTheTeam.heading: Exclusive Algarve Villas
meetTheTeam.description1: Directors Marcela Boturao & Bart van Linden would like to welcome you to meet the team of Exclusive Algarve Villas. With a wealth of knowledge in real estate, legal and fiscal matters, we can assist you throughout the process of buying and selling luxury property in the Algarve.
meetTheTeam.description2: We work with a small team of professionals who share our ideas and mind-set. Being a service providing company, we still believe in the client is king concept.

sellPropertyPage.heroTitle: Why Sell with Exclusive Algarve Villas
sellPropertyPage.localExpertiseDescription: With over 18 years of experience in Algarve real estate, Exclusive Algarve Villas isn't a generic agency — we're specialists in this region, with an office right here in Lagoa/Carvoeiro dedicated to your area. We know the neighbourhoods, the buyers, and the value drivers that matter in Carvoeiro — so your property is marketed to the right audience, not just a wide audience.
sellPropertyPage.boutiqueAgencyTitle: A Boutique Agency With a Personal Touch
sellPropertyPage.boutiqueAgencyDescription: We combine boutique-level attention with professional marketing power. Every seller receives a tailored sales strategy — from pricing and presentation to negotiation and closing — backed by a team that listens, responds, and keeps you informed every step of the way.
sellPropertyPage.multilingualDescription: Our team speaks English, Portuguese, French, Dutch, German, Italian, Spanish, and more — critical when attracting buyers from across Europe and beyond who are actively looking for Carvoeiro properties.
sellPropertyPage.provenTrackRecordDescription: Since 2006, we've helped thousands of clients with buying and selling luxury homes across the Central and Western Algarve, delivering outstanding results in diverse markets. Whether your property is a seaside villa, a modern townhouse, or a development plot, we tailor the strategy to match its unique potential.
sellPropertyPage.trustedTitle: Trusted Every Step of the Way
sellPropertyPage.trustedDescription: Our clients consistently praise our professionalism, responsiveness, and genuine care — from first contact to closing and beyond. We're not just selling properties, we're building long-term relationships based on trust, integrity, and success.
sellPropertyPage.localPresenceDescription: With offices strategically located throughout the Algarve and a strong international network, we ensure your property receives maximum visibility to qualified buyers worldwide while maintaining the personal, local touch that makes all the difference.
sellPropertyPage.formSectionDescription: Fill out the form below and one of our expert agents will contact you within 24 hours to discuss your property sale.
